item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE_NAME} Status Check
item_prototype.description:
Reports whether the instance has passed both the instance status check and the system status check in the last minute.
This metric can be either 0 (passed) or 1 (failed).
By default, this metric is available at a 1-minute frequency at no charge.

trigger_prototype.name: EC2: {#INSTANCE_NAME} Status Check failed
trigger_prototype.description: Please look at instance, whether has failed the instance status check or the system status check.

trigger_prototype.name: EFS: {#EFS_NAME} Low Burst Credit Balance
trigger_prototype.description: Burst credits allow a file system to burst to throughput levels above a file system’s baseline level for periods of time.
